decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Design and access statement, RC/0717/001, RC/0717/002, RC/0717/003 and RC/0717/007 received on 15/08/2013,  Location plan received on 05/09/2013 and RC/0717/004,  RC/0717/005 RC/0717/006 as amended and RC/0717/018 received on 03/10/2013) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The proposed safety railing must be set back from the side of the roof by at least 1m and should not exceed 1m in height.
description: Alterations to the parapet and erection of a handrail to the front, side and rear of the roof
